reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

description.narrative: The retreat will bring together all the intellectual capacity in the Sector from Headquarters and the fields to appreciate the work and capacities in the planning, developing, elaborating and implementing the SC activities collectively and inclusively as one UNESCO Science to deliver meaningful services to Members States. Through this exercise the Sector will achieve a better designing of the next Medium Term Strategy (C/4) to be more robust, focus and results driven and envisage improved approach for implementing ongoing activities and the next C/5, whilst understanding each other better, improve communication and re-inforce the synergy between Headquarters and fields for implementing our programmes as ONE UNESCO science team.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
